statements.query: MATCH (:GCPBigtableTable)<-[r:REFERENCES]-(:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: remove GCP dataflow to GCP bigtable table relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPBigqueryTable)<-[r:REFERENCES]-(:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: remove GCP dataflow to GCP bigquery table relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPPubsubTopic)<-[r:REFERENCES]-(:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: remove GCP dataflow to GCP pubsub topic relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPPubsubSubscription)<-[r:REFERENCES]-(:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: remove GCP dataflow to GCP pubsub subscription relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPSpannerInstanceDatabase)<-[r:REFERENCES]-(:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: remove GCP dataflow to GCP spanner instance database relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP dataflow job that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPDataFlowJob)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: remove GCP dataflow to GCP project relationships that are out of date.
